meanings.definition: A lung disease caused by inhaling asbestos fibers.
meanings.sent1: Asbestosis can result from breathing in tiny asbestos particles.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed him with asbestosis after years of working in construction.
meanings.sent3: The party guests joked that the dusty attic was filled with invisible asbestosis waiting to strike.
meanings.sent4: Her love for vintage buildings was like asbestosis, slowly deteriorating her lungs with each breath of history.
meanings.sent5: The documentary vividly portrayed the devastating effects of asbestosis on the workers' health.
